website_summaries.verdict: Popular, feminine-looking designer watch in warm-tone metal with diamond at 12 o'clock.
pros: Pretty and feminine-looking, rose gold-tone metal and glossy black or white metal dial
Dauphine hands and diamond at 12 o'clock
Enamel-filled alloy bangle with jewelry-clasp closure
cons: Bangle is small and does not fit big wrists

customer_reviews.title: waterproof to 95'
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing in the shower and swimming 3 x week with this. Recently went scuba diving and forgot to remove. Fine after dive to 95' so I dove all week with it. Still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Toby L. Brandtman

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch fit exactly but not able to loosen to one chain as stated in directions
customer_reviews.author: Nana Keno

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Anne Klein Watch!! My 1st one is a White Ceramic, which is Beautiful!! I wear it all the time in the summer!! The Black & Gold Bangle is Gorgeous!! This was a hard pick between the Black & Gold Bangle and the Pink & Gold Bangle!! Difficult Decision!! My Husband said he'd get the Pink & Gold for my B-Day, so I got the Black& Gold!! I love, love it!! The Most Beautiful Watches for me, are Anne Klein, over all!!
customer_reviews.author: Nano McTeague

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cannot figure out how to remove some links to make it smaller, but other than that I love this watch! its good quality and looks very expensive. Very please with my purchase...just need to figure out how to make it smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very feminine watch while having substance and quality. The watch band fit my wrist perfectly, so there was no need for adjusting to another link. The beauty of the watch exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend. (I got the pink version.)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gill

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty and feminine.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and feminine watch. I had a larger face watch just like this one, but gave it away as a gift. I loved it soo much, so I decided to purchase this one on Amazon, the face was smaller than I expected, but it is still very nice, I got compliments at work on it already.
customer_reviews.author: Sydoney Chin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this gift to myself!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this watch! It's so beautiful, it fits perfectly on my small wrist after taking off the one easy to remove extra link, and the face is big enough to SEE the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bethsedit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I bought this for my sister as a graduation gift, and it really looks nice. It has a tag that says genuine diamonds. I don't know how accurate that is, but it certainly is lovely. Very feminine and modern looking. The box was irritating because it had a sticker securing the outer paper box to the inner gift box and was very difficult to remove, but it's not too bad, and the sticker residue is on the bottom at least.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Classy / Cute
customer_reviews.text: I think the watch is very cute and office or workspace acceptable. At first I thought it would be too small for my wrist but it fit just a little snug. If I can find an extra piece to the band I will add one. Pretty and fashionable. If you need a watch for time as its soul purpose this wouldn't be the best there are no numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Saburinah

customer_reviews.title: I really love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I received this elegant beauty on Dec. 22 and as of now still have not been able to wear it. It's too small. So called the contact number provided to order extra links for free. I waited and waited then called again. I ws assured I would receive the links within the next couple of days. Well, a couple of days have come and gone and still no links. I'll give them one more call. And if no links arrive I will have to send the watch back. It's too bad because I really love this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Missi

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite watch ever. Very classy looking. Came already set to the correct time. Like the metal watchband better than the leather bands that come on other Anne Klein watches. My last Anne Klein watch had a leather band and it wore out pretty fast. Couldn't seem to find a replacement band so had to get rid of the watch which was still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: RKam2128

customer_reviews.title: Actually, a very fine watch.
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect anything out of the diamonds. They are just a little fancy speck. But the watch has 2 adjustable selections. The metal and coloring is excellent - not some cheap China product. I was actually impressed. I was ready to spend over $100 this time to get a quality everyday watch to wear. I'm very glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Lavoix

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so dainty, beautiful and sophisticated. Definitely a grown, mature woman's watch. I love the fact that it has removable links to make the band shorter, it fits my tiny wrist perfectly. I love this watch. I think I'll buy it again in other colors. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly 18 months, then died
customer_reviews.text: I got the watch in May 2018 and probably gave it then a 5-star review because I liked the style. I would like to take it back. The watch is broken. Simply stopped working. I took it to the watchmaker because I thought it needs a new battery but no, sir, it's not the battery, it's the mechanism that went kaput. So, yes, wasted about $60. Can put it into the garbage, where it belongs. No, I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gennady Samorodnitsky

customer_reviews.title: Valentine gift to my girlfriend, and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was really classic, and looks great on my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Prabhu

customer_reviews.title: Nice stylish ladies watch
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it, and since it's not super expensive she doesn't freak out if she scratches it (which she hasn't yet) - fact is she's worn it a few times and hasn't said one thing bad about it so it's a win for me as it was a present. We both thought it was stylish btw. and it keeps good time so far. Would buy again, recommended - diamond is quite small however :)
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated!
customer_reviews.text: Description says watch fits up to an 8 inch wrist. My wrist measures 7 inches, so about a 7 and a half is plenty comfortable. Watch fits up to a 6 and a half. Too small for my wrist. If there is supposed to be an extension in the box, it wasn't included. This is the third watch I've had to return. Others were different types. One was only a 6 inch, another fell off easily. Descriptions are unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan V. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have kept this watch, as it was very dainty and pretty! The only problem for me is that my wrist was too large. The clasp shut just fine, but it was just too snug and not comfortable (I like my bands to dangle and it could have used another 3 links). I ended up returning, as I needed it for an event and replacing the links would have taken too long. BUT...it is still an excellent watch for the money so I rated it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. DODSON

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, fun watch!
customer_reviews.text: My watch died during COVID-19 and I didn't know if there was a watch repair place open. I love Anne Klein watches, so decided to check Amazon. I wear white a lot, especially in the summer--so this watch was PERFECT!! I have a small wrist--I removed the extra link and it fit! If you have a larger wrist, you may need to request extra links. I may purchase the black--if the price goes back to what I paid. LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Rose M

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than anticipated; great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got a deal on the rose gold/lt. pink version of this for a gift. Much nicer looking in person than anticipated. The watch face is a nice pearlescent color with a subtle sheen. It looked great on; she loved it & has already received compliments on it. Makes a great gift & doesn’t look too cheap. Also comes with the correct time already set.
customer_reviews.author: SS7

customer_reviews.title: and was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is an attractive watch, it runs really small, so unless you have a small, petite wrist, you might want to skip this one. It is a bracelet style watch, so does not have the presence of a typical watch with links. This one had to go back, and was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: No extra link!
customer_reviews.text: Do you have a petite wrist? If not, don't buy this. I bought it as a Mothers Day gift, and it doesn't fit! And it does NOT come with any extra links! What a disappointment! My wife thought it was beautiful, and now I have to return it to Amazon. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with people who have big wrist
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Nice color. It is good quality. The single problem is if you have big wrist it could be too small for you. I have a 7 inchs wrist and it fit well but the watch doesn't moove too much on my wrist. So if you have a wrist bigger don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: laure93320

customer_reviews.title: Great Style Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for myself it’s very stylish and can be worn with causal or dressy attire. Anne Klein provides very nice products that are well made. This watch was definitely a good value for the price, it also keeps great time I would definitely purchase one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Elegant watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well-made watch. I've only owned it a short time, but I have gotten so many compliments already! It looks far more expensive than the price tag...the buckle is easy to open and close and it stays in place on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Donea Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Not my idea of a bangle watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty watch, but not what I expected. Most bangle watches I've bought are clip on rather than clasp fastened. Because of hand arthritis,b I wanted something to go on and off easily. Plus pay attention to the reviews that say how tight it is. For me, it fits but snugly. I haven't decided whether or not to return it or not.
customer_reviews.author: LARA1407

customer_reviews.title: Eye catcher, The Blue
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an Anne Kline and wasn’t settling for anything. I am extremely picky and once it attract my eyes and my heart say that’s it, I know it’s for me. The price was excellent also.
customer_reviews.author: JBR

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, subtle style, has stood the test of time
customer_reviews.text: Came with an extra extender link. Very nice. Updated: I get compliments on this watch every week, and it's pretty much the only watch I wear any more, because it matches my work and causal dress. The finish had stood up well to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, difficult for me to remove.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. However, I am on a chemo pill making it difficult to remove the watch without help. My nails have become soft and I can’t pull back the closure. I will wear the watch because it is very striking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: wife loves watch. THE ONLY PROBLEM I HAVE NOW IS I NEED AN EXTRA LINK AND CAN NOT FIND ONE HAVE IF ANYONE KNOWS WHERE THIS CAN BE FOUND PLEASE LET ME KNOW. IF NOT I WILL RETURN THIS WATCH
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite watches. Looks nice and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Watch is more beautiful than the picture, it is really what I wanted, a great price. Quality from Ann Klein is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ingeborg Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Cute watch - inaccurate color description for rose gold
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of this watch. The combination of a metal and seems like ceramic inlay. The only complaint I have is that I ordered rose gold with pink inlay and unfortunately the watch that I received did not look nowhere near rose gold it look like slightly tinted yellow gold. I kept it, just because i liked overall look of it
customer_reviews.author: Asta

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely watch-looks much more expensive than it is. That being said-this band only fits Very small wrists. Could not get this watch off without great difficulty due to clasp and adjacent links. Bruised my entire wrist in process of removal.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: More than I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the inexpensive price, one would expect a cheap piece of costume jewelry disguised as a watch, but this is a relatively good quality time piece that is fairly elegant and very attractive. My wife loved it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brazzi

customer_reviews.title: Blue rules
customer_reviews.text: I've worn and loved AK watches for over 30 years. When I saw this watch I had to get it for my friend Donna who loves everything blue. I hope she'll love AK like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for today's casual life
customer_reviews.text: This watch was not expensive ; many cheaper watches have too any sparkles and gimmicks to make them look better. This watch is clean, neat, and meets a day to day need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks like the picture, works well and is great value for money. I’ve been wearing it for about a week and I love it. It would be a nice gift for yourself or a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and more importantly comfortable watch! It does not run large. I sometimes have to remove a link, but this just fits my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: mbetti

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch looks gorgeous. The diamonds on the watch are just very beautiful and make a nice gift. The watch and gives off a premium look and has a premium feel. The watch band is also metal and that makes it easy to clean when it gets dirty. The only negative about this watch is that the dial looks kind of small but otherwise than that this is a great watch.Overall this is a great watch and I'd recommend giving it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Bought it for my 12 year old granddaughter. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because I ended up having to buy two watches. Be aware that it does not come with extra links should it not be big enough for the wrist. Other than that, it is a very nice watch!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: For the money this thing is super nice. I bought my girlfriend this and she loves it. It looks really good hopefully it lasts a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: Scratched
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived and the black ring is scuffed and scratched
customer_reviews.author: madame literati

customer_reviews.title: It has an easy remove link for my small wrist and looks so ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a white watch and this is exactly what I wanted. It has an easy remove link for my small wrist and looks so nice I am going to get a black one also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loved it and it went well with a wonderful ring, bought Prior. Perfect for one of our dress up occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Russellr48

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I bough this watch as a gift to a friend. It came on time and well packaged. Looks really pretty, If someone will give it to me I will more than please to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, giftable
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived on time and was as pictured. I bought this for my grandma for Christmas and she loved it. It’s a simple and pretty watch. I am happy that my grandma likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Fit is not expandable
customer_reviews.text: It just barely fits my wrist and I'm not heavy. A heavier person could not wear this and no extra links for the bank were given.
customer_reviews.author: elsie405

customer_reviews.title: prety
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch, it was a little tight for me. i was looking for some links for an extentions, could not find them. To me it was a beautiful watch..
customer_reviews.author: tania h pamanes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 18 year old niece. The photos show that it's nice but even nicer in person. She loved it and wears it often.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the first wear ! Was cheaply made and seems like it should be worth $10 instead of the price paid unfortunatly
customer_reviews.author: Jae L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Anne Klein watch.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby bought this as a gift for me and I'm not disappointed. I love Anne Klein watches and this goes with everything. Dressed up or casual it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Yong P.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my Mom for Mother's Day. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: SimplySusie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...Anne Klein has  always been my favorite !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a perfect watch for me...it is just what I was looking for... the rating should be 10 Stars ...
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch during an amazon deal for $26. It was a huge hit when I gave it to my sister-in-law and it looks beautiful in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: False description!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nice but when you show the description as having color on the band of the rose/gold watch then that's what you should send ! Poor description is false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Simonne Farland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this as a Christmas gift and she is in love. She has a small wrist and was happy that the band was easily adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dress watch
customer_reviews.text: Attractive dress watch. Seems to be descent quality and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good for a gift
customer_reviews.text: This product is under rated looks way better in person than the pictures. Got it for my mother-in-law she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Luque

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful i give my fiance the watch as a gift for her birthday and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kelon

customer_reviews.title: I thought the cost of the watch was very reasonable
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch face, simplistic and stylish. I was thinking the wrist band may be a smidge wider. I have a little bit of trouble snapping clasp when trying to put the watch on, but that is just probably me....I'm not very good at putting on necklaces either! I'm all fingers....
customer_reviews.author: PHIL PARSONS

customer_reviews.title: Nice time piece
customer_reviews.text: Classy time piece! So stylish & an affordable price. Than you
customer_reviews.author: g. galbom

customer_reviews.title: Stylish! Looks nice casual or dressy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this very feminine watch because it goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: MaryLu

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Item worth the money.just as it look on the picture perfect for a gift. I buy for my wife she love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my mother for Christmas and it is just so beautiful in person! I chose the white/rose gold one since it was "different" and she just loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Create2motivategifts.etsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dressy.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and sparkly. Nice dress watch. Love the black face with diamonds.
customer_reviews.author: Marge R

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, very stylish and firm. Good buy, my mom loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous watch. One of my favorites. Looks great with casual or with formal attire.
customer_reviews.author: AM2013

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a dream, perfect for my large wrist but if you have a smaller wrist there is an easy possibility to adjust it. Absolutely beautiful with real diamond highlights! Good value for the money I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Siptea

customer_reviews.title: A kids watch
customer_reviews.text: More like for a kids wrist than for a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Sampedro

customer_reviews.title: My sister really liked it
customer_reviews.text: Is a wonderful gift that isn't too hard on the wallet
customer_reviews.author: DaMack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today. I love it. I want to buy another color!
customer_reviews.author: Annette  Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty but could've used an extra link in the box
customer_reviews.author: Tasneem M.

customer_reviews.title: Choose your favorite color
customer_reviews.text: It was delivery way too early, looks stunning I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Total wow factor
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice watch. Worth what I paid for it. My wife loves it. I didn't tell her I got it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for small hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a Gift for my mother. It looks good for the price and is very pretty. My only concern is that since my mom has big hands, it was too tight for her. So my mom is planning to gift it to her friend even though she liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Deewa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. Great quality! Definitely worth the price. Delivered within days and in great condition. Packaged beautifully in a white gif table box. The clasp is tight, the band is gorgeous. Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really like the watch very pretty. Easy to down size to my wrist. I would buy this watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Damstra

customer_reviews.title: I ordered one for myself
customer_reviews.text: my mother adores my taste in your quality items. She was very pleased 😀
customer_reviews.author: Carmella Strock

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch it’s just as pretty as pictured Keeps good time and the bracelet is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sclafini

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was a xmas gift for my daughter. She liked it
customer_reviews.author: Keisi

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this watch. She wears cheap watches as jewelry but the quality of this Anne Klein watch is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: MY MOM LOVES HER WATCH. GREAT QUALITY AND VERY ELEGANT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My opinion on the watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked the watch as a Christmas gift and it fits her well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: I think this watch is really cute but it's too difficult to open the clasp. I can't even get it off the display it came on. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. Was going to return as it is too small. Decided to get links added.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments, in such a short time. I knew I loved it right away, Now I keep getting asked where I got it. Great style and fit. Perfectly as dhown
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch. Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the recipient didn't like the style but I did!
customer_reviews.author: Pasta Lover

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. Got my nails done to match...looks incredible. Nice piece of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: superauntie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish value.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely stylish watch for the money. Nicer than my Movado.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Lynn Polanin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable watch! It’s a versatile and lovely timepiece for a great price..
customer_reviews.author: Jacklynn Harp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with luxury
customer_reviews.text: One of the great luxury watch I bought from amazon. It was so great for give a gift, surprisingly it gives better quality , loved it.
customer_reviews.author: FeatureTrends

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Neutral
customer_reviews.text: Loved my new watch. I haven't worn it yet but it is sitting on my dresser and I admire it daily. The color was more neutral and will go with many outfits. I am sure I will get some compliments on the watch. It is simple and very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Early christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. After band adjustment she wears it all the time. It is perfect with her gold ring. Very much worth the cost. Gordon S.
customer_reviews.author: gordon skager

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I just simply love the pastel color of a most feminine watch.
customer_reviews.author: Aloma Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and striking.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is classic, elegant, and striking. Fits every occasion. It was easy to take out the removable link for a perfect fit. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cari4eyes

customer_reviews.title: Really elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is extremely classy and definitely enhances your outfit. The color is indeed beautiful just as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the watch. Just the right size. love the color. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Graham

customer_reviews.title: Anne Klein Women's Diamond-Accented Bangle Watch
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch for the price. I love the elegant look
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors of dusty pink and rose gold. Well packaged and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Anne Klein Women's Diamond-Accented Bangle Watch
product_meta.description:
Watch Sizing Guide Let the feminine detailing of this Anne Klein watch bring your look to the next level. Stainless steel case. Bracelet with jewelry clasp closure. Round face. Three-hand analog display with quartz movement. Hands and hour markers, diamond accent, and Anne Klein detailing. Enamel detailing on bezel. Water resistant 99 feet. Display case included. Imported




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :4.2 x 3.2 x 3 inches; 6.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :AK/1980WTRG
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 CR2 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :October 31, 2015
 * Manufacturer :AK Anne Klein
 * ASIN :B015W1VJOC

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #30,201 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #15096 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #56 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars1,327 ratings Watch Sizing Guide Let the feminine detailing of this Anne Klein watch bring your look to the next level. Stainless steel case. Bracelet with jewelry clasp closure. Round face. Three-hand analog display with quartz movement. Hands and hour markers, diamond accent, and Anne Klein detailing. Enamel detailing on bezel. Water resistant 99 feet. Display case included. Imported
feature_bullets: Rose gold-tone watch featuring glossy minimalist dial with dauphine hands and diamond at 12 o'clock
34 mm rose gold-tone metal case with mineral dial window
